name: Blus
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with Riveric loanwords
seafood- and kelp-based cuisine, strong pickling tradition
work-centered ritual customs tied to component exchange
practical tide- and star-superstitions guide daily life
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
no instant resurrection or true life-replacement magics
long-range mind influence is rare and institutionally banned
notes: tech baseline near-medieval to early-industrial with localized ritual magic
navigational auguries exist but do not replace seamanship
